duration_in_months: Our short explanation of the contract: The Department of National Defence, based in Ottawa, Ontario, is seeking bids for 372 units of FILTER ELEMENT,Manufactured by various Domesticsys’s companies, to be delivered to tactical military bases operating in Canada.
full_summary:
#### Filter Element Fluid
#### Notice of Proposed Procurement
### Request for Proposal
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the procurement of filter element fluid items. The items are to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

### Items Required
The following items are required:

* Part No.: 638683, NCAGE: 87405, FACETOR
* Part No.: CC8683, NCAGE: 87405, FACETOR
* Part No.: 593362, NCAGE: 08472, ALLIED-SIGNAL AUTOMOTIVE OF CANADA or
* Part No.: CP-28652, NCAGE: 31381, PARKER-HANNIFIN CORPORATION

### Quantities Required
The following quantities are required:

* 372 units of the above items to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* 372 units of the above items to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Requirements
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars only.
* Bidders may propose equivalent or substitute products, and must identify the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE.
* A preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services.

### Documents
The following documents are available for download:

* Amendment 1 - W8482-231316 - English RFP Clauses
* W8482-231316 English RFP Clauses

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

Matthew Lengacher
Email: matthew.lengacher@forces.gc.ca
Phone: 819-939-3725

### Tender Status
#### Tender Closing Date: April 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
